error-code.message: Invalid card number, expiration date or security code.
error-code.detail: Verify that the card number, expiration date and the CVV2 or CVC data, if provided, is correct as this can cause a wide variety of host generated error responses.
The UTG is in offline mode.
The most likely cause of this error is the card number entered is not valid.
This account is not allowed to use tokens from the request account.
Token not found in this account.
Please correct the dollar amount or break the transaction up into smaller amounts that add up to the desired amount.

The most likely cause of this error is you are attempting to change the currency code of a transaction that already has an approval code. Your processor does not allow this. You will need to void (delete) this transaction and create a new transaction to accomplish this task.
Transaction amount exceeds maximum limit. Please enter a smaller amount or contact customer service to request a higher limit.

The most likely cause of this error is either another process is working with this particular transaction or you pressed the "Back" and "Submit" buttons or the "Refresh" button. In either case, wait 30 seconds and retry your request.
The point of sale must be used to refund Debit transactions.
Client socket time-out. Please check the internet connection.
Server not available. Please try later
The most likely cause of this error is that the data provided does not meet PAGO requirements (invalid or missing data).
